name: Echoed Spirit
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You summon a spiritual version of any creature without class levels and with hit dice equal to or less than your own hit dice. It can't take damage from other creatures and takes its turn after yours. It follows your telepathic commands and disappears when the spell ends or it reaches 0 hit points.

At the start of each of its turns, it loses hit points equal to ten percent of its maximum hit points. This value increases by ten percent for each successive turn.
empower: Choose one - summons an additional creature but increases the damage taken to twenty percent, or the creature gains 3 additional AP at the start of each of its turns, or damage is delayed until the start of its third turn.
